TopicTitle: Manuever node not appearing in the blue line(Science mode)

Articles.Content:
The manuever node doesn't show in the blue lines, I don't know why it does this but it might be caused by one of these mods or the battery draining or losing signal and then regaining it or a combination of all 3. Also here is the Output log
